amendment.description: Amendment consists of the Buyer amendment to the Markey motion to recommit previously agreed to and added language that guarantees access to consumers for Competitive Local Exchange Carriers (CLECs).
amendment.purpose: Pursuant to the instructions contained in the previously agreed to motion to recommit, Mr. Tauzin reported the bill back to the House with an amendment consisting of the text of amendments numbered 2 and 3 printed in part B of House Report 107-361.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tauzin amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
